name: MirroredFluids
title: Mirrored Fluid Inputs / Outputs
author: Resnox
description:
Ever been tired of input or outputs of fluid being awfully badly placed ?
Fear not, this mod is there to help you chose the inputs/outputs you exactly want, not just mirroring the recipe, you have access to any kind of combination !

(This mod should be compatible with every mods but could take long to load depending on how many mods you have (Should be less than a second tho))
